Base.description: Preferíndo o terreo montañoso, Charmander é menos común a medida que se fai máis frío.

moveBase.name: growl
moveBase.description:
Reduces the foe's
ATTACK.

moveBase.name: scratch
moveBase.description:
Scratches with
sharp claws.

moveBase.name: leer
moveBase.description:
Reduces the foe's
DEFENSE.

moveBase.name: ember
moveBase.description:
An attack that may
inflict a burn.

moveBase.name: flamethrower
moveBase.description:
An attack that may
inflict a burn.

moveBase.name: fire-spin
moveBase.description:
Traps foe in fire
for 2-5 turns.

moveBase.name: rage
moveBase.description:
Raises ATTACK if
the user is hit.

moveBase.name: smokescreen
moveBase.description:
Lowers the foe's
accuracy.

moveBase.name: fury-swipes
moveBase.description:
Quickly scratches
2-5 times.

moveBase.name: slash
moveBase.description:
Has a high criti­
cal hit ratio.

moveBase.name: scary-face
moveBase.description:
Sharply reduces
the foe's SPEED.

moveBase.name: metal-claw
moveBase.description:
An attack that may
up user's ATTACK.

moveBase.name: fire-fang
moveBase.description:
The user bites with
flame-cloaked fangs.
It may also make the
foe flinch or sustain
a burn.

moveBase.name: flame-burst
moveBase.description:
The user attacks the target with a
bursting flame. The bursting flame damages
Pokémon next to the target as well.

moveBase.name: inferno
moveBase.description:
The user attacks by engulfing the target
in an intense fire. It leaves the target
with a burn.

Base.description: A sucedánea pode espallar auga polo seu nasello. Avisa a amigos cun sinal na auga.

moveBase.name: tackle
moveBase.description:
A full-body charge
attack.

moveBase.name: tail-whip
moveBase.description:
Lowers the foe's
DEFENSE.

moveBase.name: bite
moveBase.description:
An attack that may
cause flinching.

moveBase.name: water-gun
moveBase.description:
Squirts water to
attack.

moveBase.name: hydro-pump
moveBase.description:
A powerful water-
type attack.

moveBase.name: withdraw
moveBase.description:
Heightens the
user's DEFENSE.

moveBase.name: skull-bash
moveBase.description:
1st turn: Prepare
2nd turn: Attack

moveBase.name: bubble
moveBase.description:
An attack that may
reduce SPEED.

moveBase.name: protect
moveBase.description:
Foils attack that
turn. It may fail.

moveBase.name: rapid-spin
moveBase.description:
A high-speed
spinning attack.

moveBase.name: rain-dance
moveBase.description:
Boosts water-type
moves for 5 turns.

moveBase.name: iron-defense
moveBase.description:
Hardens the body’s surface
to sharply raise DEFENSE.

moveBase.name: aqua-tail
moveBase.description:
The user attacks by
swinging its tail as if
it were a vicious wave
in a raging storm.

moveBase.name: shell-smash
moveBase.description:
The user breaks its shell, lowering its
Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply
raising Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.
